About topology optimization¶

Optimization problems¶

A general description of an optimization problem. Method to solve: try and error, gradient descent, derivative-free, blackbox

Design optimization¶

Review the different method, parametric, shape, topology

Topology optimization¶

Little historic. The different approach: SIMP, level set. Derivative using adjoint method. As in geophysics
